description:
Pandas is the Swiss-Multipurpose Knife for Data Analysis in Python.
In this talk we will look deeper into how to gain productivity
utilising Pandas powerful indexing and make advanced analytics
a piece of cake.

We will cover:

- Pandas indexing recap
- Index Types
- Time-Series Index and resampling
- Pandas Multi-Indexing
title: Neat Analytics with Pandas Indexes
